title: One CRAZY Game
body_text:
Following the magical Season 16 and its electric finale comes
EastCoastDodgeball's
unprecedented 17th Season and what an exciting era this should be. Already scheduled is the massive mid-season showdown when
John Tronolone
goes one-on-one with
Ryan Letsche
in a crucial
White Flag v. CREAMation
encounter. But that's a story for another day ...
Fast approaching is the kick-off event to Season 17, DODGEBALL 161. A rare Friday outing, "The Writer" has taken upon himself to schedule just the sixth
Dodgeball Draft
. But don't let this familiar concept fool you. Some of the most memorable occurrences have come by way of this random team selection, not too mention produced some of
ECD's
closest classic two-team encounters.
Whatever the case, expect a star-studded, intense evening of fine dodgeball action. Standard start time of 7:15 is in effect!
History of the
Dodgeball Draft
DODGEBALL 101
..
DODGEBALL 108
..
DODGEBALL CXX-SIX
..
DODGEBALL 141
..
DODGEBALL 146
body_html:
Following the magical Season 16 and its electric finale comes EastCoastDodgeball's unprecedented 17th Season and what an exciting era this should be. Already scheduled is the massive mid-season showdown when John Tronolone goes one-on-one with Ryan Letsche in a crucial White Flag v. CREAMation encounter. But that's a story for another day ...

Fast approaching is the kick-off event to Season 17, DODGEBALL 161. A rare Friday outing, "The Writer" has taken upon himself to schedule just the sixth Dodgeball Draft. But don't let this familiar concept fool you. Some of the most memorable occurrences have come by way of this random team selection, not too mention produced some of ECD's closest classic two-team encounters.

Whatever the case, expect a star-studded, intense evening of fine dodgeball action. Standard start time of 7:15 is in effect!

History of the Dodgeball Draft
DODGEBALL 101 .. DODGEBALL 108 .. DODGEBALL CXX-SIX .. DODGEBALL 141 .. DODGEBALL 146
